messages.title: VOTE LABOUR FOR REAL CHANGE
messages.content: This election is about the next five years. Only a vote for Labour can end the Tory cuts and bring the real change we need.

contactInformation.address: Phil Hunt on behalf of Helen Goodman, both at 1 Cockton Hill Road, Bishop Auckland, DL14 6EN

images.caption: Helen Goodman walking in a garden

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Phil Hunt on behalf of Helen Goodman, both at 1 Cockton Hill Road, Bishop Auckland, DL14 6EN and printed by Stirling House, Kettering Venture Park, Kettering, Northants, NN15 6XU
